text:
Margin | Mid / Senior full stack / backend software engineer | New York NYC NY | ONSITE http://www.margin.co

Margin is an early stage startup looking for a mid to senior backend or full stack engineer. AWS/ops experience is a major plus, and someone who has worked in DevOps before and wants to make a transition into doing a bit more on the dev side while owning infrastructure would be a great fit. More info here but the position reports to me so feel free to contact me about any questions you may have (info in profile) if you'd like:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BcdCb9yJloaEAYuxge__-rG-V68...
